description: Give an object a human-readable name based on an available ref. More information: https://git-scm.com/docs/git-describe.

useCases.description: Create a unique name for the current commit (the name contains the most recent annotated tag, the number of additional commits, and the abbreviated commit hash):

Generate a name with the tag reference path:
